explanation: Owen claims he packed up and drove straight home at 8 PM. But Clue 3 reveals security footage showing Owen left the building at 7:55 PM and then returned to the parking garage via the stairwell at 8:25 PM. He didn't drive home -- he came back. Owen used that return trip to swap the parking signs before the night guard arrived at 9 PM. The ink smudges from Clue 1 match the missing supply closet marker he had access to during his late shift.
funFact: Reserved parking spots are the number one source of workplace passive-aggressive complaints, beating even thermostat wars.
